name: Banana Bread
instructions: Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C). Mash bananas in a bowl, then mix in melted butter. Stir in sugar, egg, and vanilla extract. Mix in baking soda and salt, then add flour. Pour batter into a greased loaf pan and bake for 60 minutes.

name: Vegetable Soup
instructions: Chop all vegetables. In a large pot, sauté onions and garlic until translucent. Add carrots and celery, cooking for 5 minutes. Pour in vegetable broth and add potatoes. Bring to a boil, then simmer until vegetables are tender. Add tomatoes and season to taste.

name: Fruit Smoothie
instructions: In a blender, combine your leftover fruits with yogurt and a drizzle of honey. Add ice for a thicker consistency and blend until smooth.

name: Egg Fried Rice
instructions: In a pan, scramble the eggs and set aside. In the same pan, sauté carrots and peas. Add the cooked rice and stir-fry. Mix in the scrambled eggs and soy sauce. Garnish with chopped green onions.

name: Pasta Primavera
instructions: Cook pasta according to package instructions. In a pan, heat olive oil and sauté garlic. Add mixed vegetables and cook until tender. Toss in the cooked pasta and sprinkle with Parmesan cheese.

name: Potato Fritters
instructions: Grate potatoes and onions. In a bowl, mix them with flour, eggs, salt, and pepper. Heat oil in a pan and drop spoonfuls of the mixture to fry until golden brown.

name: Chickpea Salad
instructions: In a bowl, combine chickpeas, chopped tomatoes, cucumber, and red onion. Drizzle with olive oil and lemon juice. Toss to combine.

name: Apple Crisp
instructions: Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C). Slice apples and mix with brown sugar and cinnamon. In a separate bowl, mix oats, butter, and more brown sugar. Spread apples in a baking dish and top with oat mixture. Bake for 30-35 minutes.

name: Zucchini Noodles
instructions: Spiralize zucchini into noodles. In a pan, heat olive oil and sauté garlic. Add zucchini noodles and cook until slightly soft. Top with Parmesan cheese.

name: Bread Pudding
instructions: Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C). Tear bread into pieces and place in a bowl. Mix milk, eggs, sugar, and vanilla, then pour over bread. Let soak for 30 minutes, then bake for 45 minutes.

name: Savory Quiche
instructions: Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C). In a bowl, whisk eggs and milk. Stir in cheese and spinach. Pour mixture into pie crust and bake for 35-40 minutes.

name: Peanut Butter Cookies
instructions: Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C). In a bowl, mix peanut butter, sugar, and egg until smooth. Drop spoonfuls onto a baking sheet and bake for 10-12 minutes.

name: Cabbage Stir-Fry
instructions: Shred cabbage and carrots. In a pan, heat oil and sauté garlic and ginger. Add cabbage and carrots, stir-frying until tender. Drizzle with soy sauce.

name: Muffins
instructions: Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C). In a bowl, mix flour, sugar, baking powder, and fruit. In another bowl, whisk eggs and milk. Combine wet and dry ingredients and pour into muffin tins. Bake for 20-25 minutes.

name: Tomato Sauce
instructions: Chop tomatoes, garlic, and onions. In a pot, heat olive oil and sauté onions and garlic. Add tomatoes and basil, cooking until sauce thickens.

name: Vegetable Omelette
instructions: Whisk eggs in a bowl. Sauté bell peppers and onions in a pan, then add spinach. Pour eggs over veggies and cook until set. Top with cheese before folding.

name: Rice Pudding
instructions: In a saucepan, combine rice, milk, sugar, and cinnamon. Cook over low heat until rice is tender. Stir in vanilla and serve warm.

name: Stuffed Peppers
instructions: Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C). Cook rice and mix with ground meat and tomato sauce. Stuff bell peppers with the mixture and top with cheese. Bake for 30-35 minutes.

name: Homemade Pizza
instructions: Preheat oven to 475°F (245°C). Roll out pizza dough, spread tomato sauce, and add cheese and toppings. Bake for 12-15 minutes.

name: Sweet Potato Fries
instructions: Preheat oven to 425°F (220°C). Cut sweet potatoes into fries. Toss with olive oil, salt, and paprika. Bake for 25-30 minutes until crispy.

name: Oatmeal
instructions: In a saucepan, bring milk or water to a boil. Stir in oats and cook until soft. Top with fruits and drizzle with honey.

name: Garlic Bread
instructions: Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C). Mix softened butter with minced garlic and chopped parsley. Spread on bread and bake for 10-15 minutes.

name: Minestrone Soup
instructions: In a large pot, combine broth, beans, pasta, and chopped vegetables. Bring to a boil and simmer until pasta is cooked.

name: Pumpkin Soup
instructions: Chop pumpkin, onions, and garlic. In a pot, sauté onions and garlic, then add pumpkin and broth. Cook until pumpkin is tender, then blend until smooth. Stir in cream.

name: Chocolate Chip Cookies
instructions: Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C). Cream butter and sugar, then add eggs. Mix in flour and chocolate chips. Drop spoonfuls onto a baking sheet and bake for 10-12 minutes.

name: Cucumber Salad
instructions: Slice cucumbers and mix with yogurt, minced garlic, chopped dill, and salt. Chill before serving.

name: Quinoa Salad
instructions: Cook quinoa as per package instructions. In a bowl, combine cooked quinoa, chickpeas, chopped cucumbers, and tomatoes. Drizzle with olive oil and lemon juice.

name: Pancakes
instructions: In a bowl, mix flour, baking powder, and sugar. In another bowl, whisk milk and eggs. Combine the two and cook on a griddle until bubbles form.

name: Chili
instructions: Brown ground beef in a pot. Add onions and sauté until soft. Stir in beans, tomatoes, and chili powder. Simmer for 30 minutes.

name: Grilled Cheese Sandwich
instructions: Butter one side of each bread slice. Place cheese between unbuttered sides and grill until golden brown on both sides.

name: Cauliflower Rice
instructions: Pulse cauliflower florets in a food processor until rice-sized. Sauté in olive oil with a pinch of salt until tender.

name: Pea Soup
instructions: Sauté onions in a pot. Add peas and vegetable broth, cooking until peas are soft. Blend until smooth and add mint.

name: Sausage Rolls
instructions: Roll out puff pastry and cut into rectangles. Place sausage meat in the center, roll up, and seal. Brush with egg wash and bake until golden.

name: Baked Apples
instructions: Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C). Core apples and fill with brown sugar and cinnamon. Top with butter and bake for 20-25 minutes.

name: Fried Eggplant
instructions: Slice eggplant and dip in flour, then egg, and finally breadcrumbs. Fry in oil until golden brown.

name: Lentil Stew
instructions: In a pot, sauté onions, carrots, and celery. Add lentils and vegetable broth. Simmer until lentils are tender.

name: Baked Ziti
instructions: Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C). Cook ziti and mix with marinara sauce and cooked ground meat. Top with cheese and bake for 30 minutes.

name: Chicken Stir-Fry
instructions: Slice chicken and sauté in a pan. Add mixed vegetables and soy sauce, stir-frying until everything is cooked through.

name: Fruit Salad
instructions: Chop leftover fruits and mix in a bowl. Garnish with mint leaves.

name: Coconut Rice
instructions: Cook rice in coconut milk and a pinch of salt until fluffy.

name: Apple Sauce
instructions: Peel and chop apples. Cook with sugar and cinnamon until soft. Mash until desired consistency.

name: Vegetable Curry
instructions: Sauté mixed vegetables in a pot. Add coconut milk and curry powder, simmering until vegetables are tender.

name: Chocolate Mousse
instructions: Melt chocolate and let cool. Whisk egg whites and sugar until stiff. Fold chocolate into egg whites, then fold in whipped cream. Chill before serving.

name: Lasagna
instructions: Layer noodles, marinara sauce, ricotta, and mozzarella in a baking dish. Repeat layers and bake at 375°F (190°C) for 45 minutes.

name: Pesto Pasta
instructions: Cook pasta and toss with basil pesto. Serve with grated Parmesan cheese on top.

name: Yogurt Parfait
instructions: Layer yogurt, granola, and fruits in a cup. Repeat layers and enjoy.

name: Berry Smoothie Bowl
instructions: Blend berries with yogurt until smooth. Pour into a bowl and top with granola.

name: Broccoli Cheese Bake
instructions: Steam broccoli, then mix with cheese and breadcrumbs. Bake at 350°F (175°C) for 20 minutes.
